description:
Do you own a digital camera & ONLY utilize a few settings on it? Do you find yourself turning the camera on and switching to Auto by default? Do you wish you had the time to learn more about different settings, but never seem to have the time? If you've answered "yes" to any or all of these questions, then this course is for YOU!

This course is absolutely essential for anyone since it will teach you the fundamentals of your camera. This comprehensive beginners course highlights the photographers toolkit, camera settings, as well as understanding exposure. Additionally, there are discussion boards, worksheets and a quiz to supplement all the information in the lectures. This course will last about two hours and is perfect for all ages!
title: Basic Digital Photography: A Beginners DSLR Instructional
